Name: Patrónomy
Ingredients: 25 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR briefly. Special Ingredient #1: Gentain eau-de-vie
Review: Created by Remy Savage, the head bartender behind the celebrated Paris cocktail bar Little Red Door, for Patrón Tequila at London Cocktail Week 2016.
Nutrition: One serving of Patrónomy contains 129 calories
Garnish: Rim glass with black salt. Grapefruit zest twist
